pages.text: $(l)Influential Blocks$() $(br)$(li)Raw Iron Block$(li)Ice Block$(li)Packed Ice$(li)Snow$(li)Blue Ice$(li)Gravel$(li)Packed Mud

The following array of numbers lists the amount of potential block values required for this gem to emerge. Please note that this is a rough estimate and your results will vary.$(br)[255, 50, 95, 25, 0, 90]
This gem can be injected with a tier 2 injector setup.
